TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileResponseElement extends System.Web.Caching.ResponseElement

summary.span: 表示存储为文件的输出缓存项一部分。

span.span: Represents part of an output-cache entry, stored as a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 (的正文部分，而不是输出缓存项的标头) 。The class represents the body portion (instead of the header) of an output-cache entry. 对象中的数据 可存储为文件的一部分或全部。The data from a object can be stored as either part or all of a file. ASP.NET 和自定义输出缓存提供程序都可以使用对象的任意组合在多个部分中返回响应 。Both ASP.NET and custom output-cache providers can return a response in multiple parts, using any combination of objects. 例如，提供程序可以返回分段为三个不同对象的响应 ，并且每个对象都可以从偏移量检索到不同的物理文件。For example, a provider can return a response that is segmented into three different objects, and each object can be retrieved from an offset into a different physical file.

MemberSignature.Value: public FileResponseElement (string path, long offset, long length);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string path, int64 offset, int64 length) cil managed
Public Sub New (path As String, offset As Long, length As Long)
public: FileResponseElement(System::String ^ path, long offset, long length);
new System.Web.Caching.FileResponseElement : string * int64 * int64 -> System.Web.Caching.FileResponseElement

span.span: The fully qualified path for the file.

param.name: offset
param.span: 文件中字符串开始的位置。

span.span: The position in the file where the string starts.

param.name: length
param.span: 数据的长度，该数据从 定义的文件中表示输出缓存数据的偏移位置开始。

span.span: The length of the data, starting at the offset that represents the output-cache data in the file defined by .

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在一个文件中，则提供程序将 使用0的偏移量和一个与整个文件大小相等的长度来初始化类。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, and a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果完整的输出缓存响应仅包含在文件的部分中，则提供程序将 使用输出缓存响应启动的文件中的偏移量和长度（等于存储在该文件中的输出缓存响应的大小）来初始化类。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts, and a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

public: property long Length { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取数据的大小，该数据从包含 实例数据的偏移位置开始。

span.span: Gets the size of the data, starting at the offset that contains the data for a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在单个文件中，则输出缓存提供程序将 使用与整个文件大小相等的长度来初始化类。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, an output cache provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the whole file. 如果完整的输出缓存响应仅包含在文件的部分中，则提供程序将 使用与存储在该文件中的输出缓存响应大小相等的长度来初始化类。If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using a length equal to the size of the output-cache response that is stored in that file.

summary.span: 获取 实例数据在文件中的起始位置。

span.span: Gets the position in the file where the data from a instance starts.

value.span: 数据在文件中的起始点。

span.span: The starting point of the data in the file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果完整的输出缓存响应包含在单个文件中，则提供程序会 使用0的偏移量初始化类，如果完整的输出缓存响应仅包含在文件的一部分中，则提供程序将 使用输出缓存响应开始的文件中的偏移量初始化类。If the complete output-cache response is contained in a single file, a provider initializes the class by using an offset of zero, If the complete output cache response is contained in only part of a file, a provider initializes the class by using the offset in the file where the output cache response starts.
